ngiemboon: Á gwɔ́ na mbɔ́ɔntè lyɛ̌ʼ lefɔ̌ɔn, Mǒonsê tóŋo Áloŋ pâ penkʉ́ pé pembàŋa, mbɔɔ Melÿò tsɛ̀ɛ láʼa Ésàlayɛ.
en: On the eighth day Moses summoned Aaron, his sons, and the elders of Israel.

ngiemboon: Ńgɔɔn mbwó Áloŋ ngie: «Lɔgɔ múɔ ndúm fòŋ we lɔg nuŋe pwɔʼ lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa, ńgÿo tàʼ kùkwòon we lɔg nuŋe pwɔʼ shúm sie mé tuɔ tà é pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm. E gwɔ́ pie lɔ̌ʼ té na pɔ́b wɔ́, ńtó ńnuŋe pwɔʼ mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: He said to Aaron, “Take a young bull for a sin   offering and a ram for a burnt offering, both without blemish,  # 9:2 Ex 29:1 and present them before the Lord.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ piŋ ńtsẅii mbwó pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ngie pɔ́ lɔgɔ tàʼ fÿɛ̀ lɔg nuŋe pwɔʼ, we lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa, mbɔɔ tàʼ múɔ fòŋ, ńgÿo tàʼ njʉ̀njÿò, é pie é gẅiin tàʼ ngùʼ, ḿbiŋ te lɔ̌ʼ gẅiin ńdɔg ńtó nuŋe mmó pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm,
en: And tell the Israelites:   Take a male goat for a sin offering; a calf and a lamb, male yearlings without blemish, for a burnt offering;

ngiemboon: ńgÿo tàʼ fòŋ lé tàʼ kùkwòon we lɔg nuŋe pwɔʼ mbʉ́lè, tá ńdɔg ńnuŋe pwɔʼ mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, ńgíŋe ńgÿo mmó pwɔʼ gie mé lagá nkáʼ mbà mé lɔg mevɛ́ ńnuʼ. Á nue yɔɔn áa lyɛʼɛ́ láʼ gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge nyɛ́ mbùm yé mbwó pi.»
en: an ox and a ram for a fellowship offering to sacrifice before the Lord; and a grain offering mixed with oil. For today the Lord is going to appear   to you.”

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ lɔgɔ mmó gie Mǒonsê la tsẅi ne pɔ́b ńtóo ncwò ntàb mbumté, aláʼa ntsèm tó ńtyé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: They brought what Moses had commanded to the front of the tent of meeting, and the whole community came forward and stood before the Lord.

ngiemboon: Mǒonsê gɔɔn ngie: Ammó gie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a tsẅi á yɔɔn: pi gÿo púʼu, legúʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a kẅɛɛ mvfò pi.
en: Moses said, “This is what the Lord commanded you to do, that the glory of the Lord    may appear to you.”

ngiemboon: Mǒonsê tsẅii mbwó Áloŋ ngie: Tóo ńtyé jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, ńnuŋe pwɔʼ gú we lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa mbɔɔ we shúm pwɔʼ sie mé tuɔ tà é pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm; ńgÿo páʼ mé zɔɔn ńgÿo púʼu lélɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa mú mbɔɔ mé láʼ, ńgíŋe ńnuŋe pwɔʼ we láʼ lélɔg ńdúɔ lévéle mefʉa mɔ́b, páʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la tsẅi.
en: Then Moses said to Aaron, “Approach the altar and sacrifice your sin offering and your burnt offering; make atonement for yourself and the people.  ,# 9:7 Heb 5:1–3; 7:26–27 Sacrifice the people’s offering and make atonement for them, as the Lord commanded.”

ngiemboon: Áloŋ leen ńké ńtsóte nnɛ́ né jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, ńzẅé múɔ fòŋ gẅie à lɔ̌g ńdúɔ mefʉa mé.
en: So Aaron approached the altar and slaughtered the calf as a sin offering for himself.

ngiemboon: Penkʉ́ Áloŋ pembàŋa lɔg metse ńtó ńnáa mbwó Áloŋ, á cÿɔʼɔ tepwó we tsoló ńzaa na mendóŋ jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, ḿbiŋ ḿpfɛte pfwɔ̀ʼɔ metse tsìŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ.
en: Aaron’s sons brought the blood to him, and he dipped his finger in the blood and applied it to the horns of the altar. He poured out the blood at the base of the altar.

ngiemboon: À tuɔ mefóon ndùm jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, mbɔɔ menbaŋnkàʼ mé, ńgÿo mefabmbyè mmó pwɔʼ lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa, áa páʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a la tsẅii mbwó Mǒonsê.
en: He burned the fat, the kidneys, and the fatty lobe of the liver from the sin offering on the altar, as the Lord had commanded Moses.

ngiemboon: Tá ńké ńgʉa na mbab pɔ́ ngùb, mbà mé ge fó jʉʼ gie mé tsẅé wó, é kẅɛ, é maʼa mmɔ̌g.
en: He burned the flesh and the hide   outside the camp.  # 9:11 Ex 29:14; Lv 4:8–10,12,21; 8:17; 16:27

ngiemboon: Áloŋ záʼa twó nɔ̀ɔn we shúm pwɔʼ sie mé tuɔ tá é pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm. Penkʉ́ Áloŋ pembàŋa ná metse né yé, á za metse na mengʉ̀ŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ tà ńkéle ḿbume.
en: Then he slaughtered the burnt offering. Aaron’s sons brought him the blood, and he splattered it on all sides of the altar.

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ gíŋe náa mmó pwɔʼ gie pɔ́ zaʼté mekèm mekèm, ńgÿo twó, Áloŋ tuɔ jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ.
en: They brought him the burnt offering piece by piece, along with the head, and he burned them on the altar.

ngiemboon: Á sɔg shúm lepfòm pâ mentɔ̌ɔn kwò ḿbú ńtuɔ jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, á ndùm shúm pwɔʼ sie mé tuɔ tá é pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm.
en: He washed the entrails and the legs and burned them with the burnt offering on the altar.

ngiemboon: Afʉ̀ʼ kuʼ, á nuŋe pwɔʼ we láʼ, ḿbiŋ ńdɔgɔ tàʼ fÿɛ̀ ńnuŋe pwɔʼ lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa láʼ, ńzáʼa lóŋ we ńdɔg ńnuŋe pwɔʼ lɔg ḿvéle mefʉa ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ à ka zɔɔn ńgÿo na wetsɔ̌ nɔ̀ɔn.
en: Aaron presented the people’s offering. He took the male goat for the people’s sin offering, slaughtered it, and made a sin offering with it as he did before.

ngiemboon: À lɔgɔ mmó pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm ńtó, ńnuŋe páʼ mé zɛ́te páʼ mé nuŋé púʼu.
en: He presented the burnt offering and sacrificed it according to the regulation.

ngiemboon: À lɔgɔ mmó pwɔʼ gie mé lagá nkáʼ ńtó, ḿbí tà á lúe pwó yé, ńtuɔ jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, ḿbiŋ ńgÿo mmó pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ tà à pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm gie mé náa mbaʼámbaʼ.
en: Next he presented the grain offering, took a handful of it, and burned it on the altar in addition to the morning burnt offering.

ngiemboon: É záʼa lóŋ ndúm fòŋ pɔ́ kùkwòon ye lɔg nuŋe pwɔʼ mbʉ́lè we láʼ. Penkʉ́ Áloŋ pembàŋa gíŋe ná metse ńná né yé, á lɔg ńza mengʉ̀ŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ tà ńkéle ḿbume,
en: Finally, he slaughtered the ox and the ram as the people’s fellowship sacrifice. Aaron’s sons brought him the blood, and he splattered it on all sides of the altar.

ngiemboon: tà mbɔɔ mefóon ndúm fòŋ pɔ́ mé kùkwòon, tà mbɔɔ nkú mbɔɔ mefóon mie ée na membaŋnkàʼ lâ mefabmbyè.
en: They also brought the fat portions from the ox and the ram #— #the fat tail, the fat surrounding the entrails, the kidneys, and the fatty lobe of the liver #— #

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ kẅile mefóon ńnéŋe na mekékʉ́b, Áloŋ tuɔ mejʉʼ mbab mbòŋo mie é gẅiin mefóon á jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ.
en: and placed these on the breasts. Aaron burned the fat portions on the altar,

ngiemboon: Áloŋ nuŋe mekékʉ́b pâ ntɔ́ɔn kwò ye yetʉ̀, ńkwéʼe ńnáa tÿó mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a páʼ Mǒonsê la tsẅi ne yé.
en: but he presented the breasts   and the right thigh as a presentation offering  # 9:21 Ex 29:24 before the Lord, as Moses had commanded.  # 9:21 Some Hb mss, LXX, Sam read as the Lord commanded Moses

ngiemboon: Afʉ̀ʼ gie Áloŋ nuŋe mmó pwɔʼ lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa, mbɔɔ gie mé tuɔ tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm, ńgÿo ye mbʉ́lè, Áloŋ kwéʼe mbwó mé ńdɔg ńdíe láʼ, ńnéŋ mbʉ́lè na pɔ́b. Éfó jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ sẅɛ́ʼ.
en: Aaron lifted up his hands toward the people and blessed   them. He came down after sacrificing the sin offering, the burnt offering, and the fellowship offering.

ngiemboon: Mǒonsê pɔ́ Áloŋ kúu tsɛ̀ɛ ntàb mbumté, ńgwɔ́ tà ńkẅɛ, ńnéŋ mbʉ́lè na láʼ, legúʼ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a kẅɛɛ mvfò láʼa ntsèm.
en: Moses and Aaron then entered the tent of meeting. When they came out, they blessed the people, and the glory of the Lord appeared to all the people.

ngiemboon: Etsɔ́ mmɔ̌g éfó mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ńkẅɛ, ńtuɔ mmó pwɔʼ gie mé nuŋe páʼ á ge pú shÿó pɔ́ mefóon ntsèm mie ée ndùm jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, aláʼa ntsèm gyá, ḿbú ńkwéʼe megyè lekág. É sɔ́b meshÿó mɔ́b ssé.
en: Fire came from the Lord and consumed   the burnt offering and the fat portions on the altar. And when all the people saw it, they shouted  # 9:24 Ps 35:27; Is 12:6; 24:14 and fell facedown.  # 9:24 Nm 16:4
